channel.title: Bullying
channel.description:
Has anyone here on Moparscape ever been bullied? I for a fact have, when I was in grade school, I was a little fat, and people always directed fat comments towards me, for example, Fat lard, lard ass, play a sport and loose some weight, I couldn't help it, I had a real slow metabolism, but they never understood that, soon after my parents had me drop out and go to a private school. I hated it, I had no friends, but atleast I didn't get bullied. Bullying is a serious issue to me, here is a video I found on youtube about bullying: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=isfn4OxCPQs
Discuss, do you think bullying is an issue? Do you agree with bullying? I'm interested to hear from all of you.

item.title: Bullying
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Hehe. Lard ass. Matches you online pretty much since you are so rude and you think you are the boss on the internet.

OT: I never really had a hard time being bullied. I have a super fast matabolism and I am 6ft 4 with size 16 feet, so no one really messes with me. I am a soccer player also so I am active, the only physical feature that I have’t had a problem with yet, is my genetic acne which I am currently on Accutane for.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

are you guys serious? no physical violence happens in our school, and rarely in our community

Read full topic

item.title: Bullying
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:35, topic:418504”]Whenever someone attempted to bully me (in middle school), I fought them.

First day of grade 6, punched a kid in the face because he wouldn’t fuck off. He punched me in the back of the head as I walked away.

A kid started calling me names in class. Right after class I punched him in the face and he fell to the floor. His friend jumped on my back as I was walking away and I pushed him off of me into a locker.

Once when I was heading home, a kid knocked me off of my skateboard by stepping on the tail. The next day I kicked him in the balls. The day after, him and his friend both chased me down and beat my face in.

Basically, I don’t let myself get bullied. I retaliate. I’m in grade 12 now, and I haven’t been in a fight since grade 7. I was suspended for 2-3 days for each of these occasions.[/quote]

Only pussies kick people in the balls.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullying
item.dc:creator: @Lolsmatt Lolsmatt
item.description:
@Lolsmatt wrote:

Beat there ass’es and they wont bullie you no more

Read full topic

item.title: Bullying
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Totally against bullying. In some cases it leads to suicide. On my old school i used to be bullied by 2 gypsies. Now in highschool I seem to have been having this fag pissing me off for almost 3 years but i’ll get him someday. Just waiting for the right moment. Won’t graduate in peace if that isn’t done.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullying
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:34, topic:418504”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=521041.msg3785964#msg3785964 date=1318880856]
I got bullied throughout elementary (primary) school. Then, near the end of the school year in 6th grade, I decided enough was enough. He came over to me, pushed me out of my chair, told me to get up, I did and he pushed me again. I got up once more, grabbed the chair (plastic with metal legs), hit him across the back, and he hit the ground. I kept hitting him with it. After I was done with the chair, I started kicking him in the head.
[/quote]

That sounds like fun.
How long did you get suspended?[/quote]

I didn’t. Teacher was out of the room (which is when the bully came over). He didn’t say anything, neither did anyone else in the class. Claimed he fell and hit his head on the cart (held our notebooks and such.)

Read full topic

item.title: Bullying
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Whenever someone attempted to bully me (in middle school), I fought them.

First day of grade 6, punched a kid in the face because he wouldn’t fuck off. He punched me in the back of the head as I walked away.

A kid started calling me names in class. Right after class I punched him in the face and he fell to the floor. His friend jumped on my back as I was walking away and I pushed him off of me into a locker.

Once when I was heading home, a kid knocked me off of my skateboard by stepping on the tail. The next day I kicked him in the balls. The day after, him and his friend both chased me down and beat my face in.

Basically, I don’t let myself get bullied. I retaliate. I’m in grade 12 now, and I haven’t been in a fight since grade 7. I was suspended for 2-3 days for each of these occasions.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullying
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

zyle1992:

I got bullied throughout elementary (primary) school. Then, near the end of the school year in 6th grade, I decided enough was enough. He came over to me, pushed me out of my chair, told me to get up, I did and he pushed me again. I got up once more, grabbed the chair (plastic with metal legs), hit him across the back, and he hit the ground. I kept hitting him with it. After I was done with the chair, I started kicking him in the head.

That sounds like fun.
How long did you get suspended?

Read full topic

item.title: Bullying
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Sometimes it doesn’t matter how big you are, people pick on you for different reasons and only stop when you scare them. Thats who some nerd like people cant stop being bullied, i was personally just too young to know what was going on. I only figure it out now because i think into it more, i was a really stupid kid. :\

Read full topic

item.title: Bullying
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Play football. I am fat but Linemen are supposed to be fat. You get to mess people up too. You make a name for yourself on the football team no one will mess with you. Put some muscle on in the weight room during the off season, you gain respect from the older players too. Buy a pair of nikes too. I am already big (6’4 230lb) but with a pair of nikes on, it adds another inch. Plus you get swaqqed out.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullying
item.dc:creator: @UnHoly1 UnHoly_
item.description:
@UnHoly1 wrote:

I have never been bullied in my life (I’m 6ft2in 180Lb), but I have seen someone get bullied and it isn’t a joke. It can and will hurt the kid that is being bullied emotionally throughout his/her life.

Read full topic

item.title: Bullying
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Noob1 Teh_Noob
item.description:
@Teh_Noob1 wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:19, topic:418504”]I saw this when it first happened, i personally think it was bad for him to have reacted how did. Sometimes fighting back make it worse, i had a small fight (more like a wrestling match) with a guy when i was in year 7. His friends walked over and i walked off because he was on the ground and it just looked really awkward, but i was bullied in primary school for being… different. When i started high school the boys were intimidated and started calling me a “man” because of how i would act although its very obvious i’m not. Now i’m no longer picked on because the guys are really scared of me, no idea why. ;)[/quote]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b_rZn8YKEzU
I know, who would want to meet Bieber, but everyone thinks this kid is a ‘Bully Hero’
Look up Casey Heynes on youtube, you will find a bunch of shit.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I saw this when it first happened, i personally think it was bad for him to have reacted how did. Sometimes fighting back make it worse, i had a small fight (more like a wrestling match) with a guy when i was in year 7. His friends walked over and i walked off because he was on the ground and it just looked really awkward, but i was bullied in primary school for being… different. When i started high school the boys were intimidated and started calling me a “man” because of how i would act although its very obvious i’m not. Now i’m no longer picked on because the guys are really scared of me, no idea why.
